actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on HELP.

committees.committee: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

official_title: A bill to deem the application submitted by the Dodson Public Schools District for Impact Aid payments for fiscal year 1998 as timely submitted.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Education to deem the application from the Dodson Public Schools District No. 2-A, Dodson, Montana, for FY 1998 Impact Aid payments as timely submitted in accordance with specified requirements of the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965.

titles.title: A bill to deem the application submitted by the Dodson Public Schools District for Impact Aid payments for fiscal year 1998 as timely submitted.
